description: Returns a list of Fleet Advisor databases in your account.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: If you specify any of the following filters, the output includes information for only those databases that meet the filter criteria: database-id --- The ID of the database. database-name --- The name of the database. database-engine --- The name of the database engine. server-ip-address --- The IP address of the database server. database-ip-address --- The IP address of the database. collector-name --- The name of the associated Fleet Advisor collector. An example is: describe-fleet-advisor-databases --filter Name="database-id",Values="45" (dict) --- Identifies the name and value of a filter object. This filter is used to limit the number and type of DMS objects that are returned for a particular Describe* call or similar operation. Filters are used as an optional parameter for certain API operations. The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation. The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Databases
nested_items.description: Provides descriptions of the Fleet Advisor collector databases, including the database's collector, ID, and name.

nested_items.name: DatabaseId
nested_items.description: The ID of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: NumberOfSchemas
nested_items.description: The number of schemas in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory database.

nested_items.name: ServerId
nested_items.description: The ID of a server in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of a server in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name address of a server in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: SoftwareDetails
nested_items.description: The software details of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory, such as database engine and version.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The database engine of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory, for example Microsoft SQL Server.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: The database engine version of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory, for example 2019.

nested_items.name: EngineEdition
nested_items.description: The database engine edition of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory, for example Express.

nested_items.name: ServicePack
nested_items.description: The service pack level of the database.

nested_items.name: SupportLevel
nested_items.description: The support level of the database, for example Mainstream support.

nested_items.name: OsArchitecture
nested_items.description: The operating system architecture of the database.

nested_items.name: Tooltip
nested_items.description: Information about the database engine software, for example Mainstream support ends on November 14th, 2024.

nested_items.name: Collectors
nested_items.description: A list of collectors associated with the database.

nested_items.name: CollectorReferencedId
nested_items.description: The reference ID of the Fleet Advisor collector.

nested_items.name: CollectorName
nested_items.description: The name of the Fleet Advisor collector.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If NextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of NextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged.
